=======
LEGEND
=======

step = step1la or step1lb or step1lc or step2la or step2lb or step2lc or step1ra or step1rb or step1rc or step2ra or step2rb or step2rc
: = htl
; = curmarker and startrow
_ = ftl
. = Background
+ = humana
~ = fishi and water
player = humana or fisha or gonnajump or curmarker or crashl or crashr or step1rc or step2rc or step1lc or step2lc or hughdead or fitchdead
human = humana or humani or gonnajump or crashl or crashr or step1rc or step2rc or step1lc or step2lc
fish = fisha or fishi
, = water
# = ground
* = light and water
[ = rock and water
3 = pause3
2 = pause2
1 = pause1

' = tick
" = quotes
| = black and tutorial

4 = ht
5 = hb
6 = hl
7 = hr

8 = ft
9 = fb
0 = fl
` = fr

- = black

^ = light

@ = rock
letter = q or w or e or r or t or y or u or i or o or p or a or s or d or f or g or h or j or k or l or z or x or c or v or b or n or m or period or comma or exclamation or question or tick or quotes

solid = light or rock or ground or human or fish or black
voter = light or rock or human or fish

hxx = htl or htm or htr or hml or hmm or hmr or hbl or hbm or hbr
fxx = ftl or ftm or ftr or fml or fmm or fmr or fbl or fbm or fbr
hx = ht or hb or hl or hr
fx = ft or fb or fl or fr
pause = pause3 or pause2 or pause1
arrow = xarrow or rarrow

=======

SFX1 14382107
SFX5 87201707

======
RULES
======



late [good1] -> []
late [arrow] -> []
late down [tutorial | | no arrow | | | | | no arrow] -> [tutorial | | rarrow | | | | | ]
late right [human|black] -> [human good1|black]
late down [good1][tutorial | | rarrow | | | | | no arrow] -> [good1][tutorial | | xarrow | | | | | ]

late down [fisha][good1][tutorial | | xarrow | | | | | no arrow] -> [fisha][good1][tutorial | |  | | | | | rarrow]

[moving player][hughdead] -> restart
[moving player][fitchdead] -> restart

horizontal [water|] -> [water|water]
down [water|] -> [water|]



horizontal [hx | ... | ] -> [hx | ... | humanback]
horizontal [fx | ... | ] -> [fx | ... | fishback]

right [hl | ] -> [hl | textback]
right [fl | ] -> [fl | textback]
right [textback | no hr no fr] -> [textback | textback ]

([stationary humana no aged][topair] -> cancel
[stationary fisha no aged] [topair]-> cancel)

[curmarker] -> [notext curmarker]
[notext][letter unrevealed] -> [][letter unrevealed]
[action curmarker][letter unrevealed] -> [action curmarker][letter revealed] 
[action curmarker][notext] -> win
[notext][curmarker] -> [notext][curmarker moved]
[notext] -> []

[moving curmarker] -> [stationary curmarker]


[pause1 curmarker] -> [curmarker moved]
[pause2 curmarker] -> [pause1 curmarker moved]
[pause3 curmarker] -> [pause2 curmarker moved]

[letter no revealed no unrevealed humanback][curmarker humanback] -> [letter unrevealed humanback][curmarker humanback]
[letter no revealed no unrevealed fishback][curmarker fishback] -> [letter unrevealed fishback][curmarker fishback]

[letter no revealed no unrevealed] -> [letter revealed]

right [curmarker no moved fishback| ] -> [fishback|curmarker moved] SFX1
right [curmarker no moved humanback| ] -> [humanback|curmarker moved] SFX5
[curmarker letter unrevealed] -> [curmarker letter revealed] 
right [curmarker moved | ... | letter] -> [curmarker | ... | letter]
right [curmarker moved | ... | pause] -> [curmarker | ... | pause]
down [startrow|][curmarker no pause moved] -> [|startrow curmarker][]

[curmarker] -> again


[letter revealed fishback] -> [letter revealed fishback frevealed]
[letter revealed humanback] -> [letter revealed humanback hrevealed]
right [htl||] -> [htl|htm|htr]
down [htl||] -> [htl|hml|hbl]
down [htm||] -> [htm|hmm|hbm]
down [htr||] -> [htr|hmr|hbr]

right [hxx|no hxx] -> [hxx | hr]
right [no hxx|hxx] -> [hl| hxx]
up [no hxx|hxx] -> [hb|hxx]
up [hxx|no hxx] -> [hxx|ht]

right [ftl||] -> [ftl|ftm|ftr]
down [ftl||] -> [ftl|fml|fbl]
down [ftm||] -> [ftm|fmm|fbm]
down [ftr||] -> [ftr|fmr|fbr]

right [fxx|no fxx] -> [fxx | fr]
right [no fxx|fxx] -> [fl| fxx]
up [no fxx|fxx] -> [fb|fxx]
up [fxx|no fxx] -> [fxx|ft]

[player] -> [player turnend]

[action human] -> [action human fall]
[moving human] -> [moving human fall]
[left human] -> [left human dleft]
[right human] -> [right human dright]

up [water | no water] -> [water topair | ]
horizontal [topair | ... | water no topair] -> [|...|water]

[action humana][fishi] -> [humani][fisha]
[action fisha][humani] -> [fishi][humana]
[action gonnajump][fishi] -> [humani][fisha]


up [gonnajump | solid] -> [humana | solid]
down [vertical humana | solid ] -> [gonnajump | solid] 


up[fall] [solid|horizontal gonnajump | no solid ] ->[] [solid|  |horizontal humana jumping] SFX2
up[fall] [solid|up gonnajump | no solid ] ->[] [solid|  | humana jumping] SFX2
[vertical human] -> [stationary human]
 
[> fish | no water] -> [stationary fish | ]

left [left human no jumping| ground] -> [human | ground toherel]
left [left human no jumping| fish] -> [human | fish toherel]
left [left human no jumping| rock | solid] -> [human | rock toherel | solid]
left [left human no jumping| light | solid] -> [human | light toherel | solid]
right [right human no jumping| ground] -> [human | ground toherer]
right [right human no jumping| fish] -> [human | fish toherer]
right [right human no jumping| rock | solid] -> [human | rock toherer | solid]
right [right human no jumping| light | solid] -> [human | light toherer | solid]


[step2la] -> [humana]
[turnend][step1la] -> [][step2la] again
[step1la] -> [step2la] again
[step2ra] -> [humana] 
[turnend][step1ra] -> [][step2ra] again
[step1ra] -> [step2ra] again

up [human][solid toherel| no solid] -> [][solid | step1la] SFX0 again
up [human][solid toherer| no solid] -> [][solid | step1ra] SFX0 again

left [solid | step1la] -> cancel
left [solid | step2la] -> cancel

right [solid | step1ra] -> cancel

up [| step1lb] -> [step1lc|step1lb]

down [down fish | solid no ground ] -> [fish downvote downvote2| solid]


 late [jumping humani] -> [humani]

late [crashl no pause2] -> [humana]
late [crashr no pause2] -> [humana]

late [crashr pause2] -> [crashr] again

late down [dright][jumping][human | solid] -> [][][crashr pause2| solid] again SFX3

late up [upvote | downvote] -> [|]

+ late down [downvote no fish| no downvote no upvote no fish voter] -> [|downvote  voter]

+ late down [ voter no water no fish|downvote voter] -> [downvote voter | downvote voter]
+ late down [ voter no fish|downvote light water] -> [downvote voter | downvote light water]
